title: French Vogue magazine text typeface
content: i suppose this is one of the easiest questions for people here so I don't attach any pics......:) thanks a lot
author: marcadonbalon

comments.content: Yeah, oh so easy. So easy I won’t even post an answer.

Seriously, you might want to add an image if you can. If you can’t you could try google. “site:typophile.com french vogue magazine text font” gets you this [http://www.typophile.com/node/669#comment-4690](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/669#comment-4690 "http://www.typophile.com/node/669#comment-4690") .

Seriously Edward, how are we supposed to know what text face French Vogue is set in? The "Identification" part in "Type Identification Board" means we _look_ at type and recognize it. Not that we have a humongous database of type usage in our brains. :^P
Got a copy here, pretty certain it's Caslon 540.

lol, here is a sample  
 [http://justmycupoftea.typepad.com/just\_my\_cup\_of\_tea/images/french\_vogue...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090104/http:/justmycupoftea.typepad.com/just_my_cup_of_tea/images/french_vogue_1.jpg "http://justmycupoftea.typepad.com/just\_my\_cup\_of\_tea/images/french\_vogue\_1.jpg")  
 [http://www.nitrolicious.com/blog/wp-gallery/1206/misc/vogue\_fr\_hearts\_ni...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090104/http:/www.nitrolicious.com/blog/wp-gallery/1206/misc/vogue_fr_hearts_nitrolicious.jpg "http://www.nitrolicious.com/blog/wp-gallery/1206/misc/vogue\_fr\_hearts\_nitrolicious.jpg")

note that they like mixing regular and italic in one block...

I didn't post a sample not becoz I am lazy, but I just really stupidly thought that someone here would instantly get the answer! just like I asked "Eye magazine typeface" :P now I will get sample for every question I raise from now on.....
